Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“You guys are over here.{Line} Backup the advance guards.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“You guys are over here.{Line} Backup the advance guards.”

Monologue.Current: Nida{Line}“{Char Squall}.{Line} Get back to the {Color Blue}〖bridge〗{Color White}!”
Monologue.Original: Nida{Line}“{Char Squall}.{Line} Get back to the {Color Blue}〖bridge〗{Color White}!”
“S’cuse me,{Line} do you play an instrument?”

Monologue.Current: “Эй, это же я! Помнишь, я налетела{Line} на тебя у классной комнаты?”
Monologue.Original: “Heeey, I know you! I ran into you{Line} by the classroom, right?”

Monologue.Current: “Я теперь в исполнительном{Line} комитете Садового фестиваля!”
Monologue.Original: “I’m on the executive committee{Line} for the Garden Festival.”
“If you’re interested, come by{Line} and check out the stage.”
“It’s my dream to form my own band.”
“Of course I’ll need four people...{Line} Wanna join?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“The enemy Garden is right by us!{Line} Quad team! Watch out!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“The enemy Garden is right by us!{Line} Quad team! Watch out!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Go straight ahead, to the {Color Blue}〖left〗{Color White}!{Line} We gotta stop’em from comin’ in!{Line} Don’t forget to equip your {Color Yellow}〖GF〗{Color White}!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Go straight ahead, to the {Color Blue}〖left〗{Color White}!{Line} We gotta stop’em from comin’ in!{Line} Don’t forget to equip your {Color Yellow}〖GF〗{Color White}!”

Monologue.Current: “{Char Squall}, this is the headmaster speaking.{Line} Please report to my office.”
Monologue.Original: “{Char Squall}, this is the headmaster speaking.{Line} Please report to my office.”
